caption.title: The percentage of apoptosis and necrosis in (A) MCF-7 and (B) WEHI-164 were evaluated by cell death detection ELISA kit. The cells were treated with 48-h IC 50 concentrations of DCM and MeOH extracts of S. amplexicaulis for 24 h. Data are presented as the mean Â± SEM of three independent experiments. **P < 0.01 compared with the untreated control.
